main event: A UFO sighting was reported on December 1, 1957, in Englewood, Ohio, observing a reddish rolling object with vapor trails.
interesting points: The object was described as reddish and the size of a shirt button., The sighting lasted for approximately 6 minutes., The object was reported to have a glow and emitted vapor trails., The course of the object was towards the east., Observers included local residents, including children who were frightened by the sighting.
witness description: Children and parents who were nearby at the time of the sighting reported it.
